feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for Tennessee Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 7:34PM CST until February 17 at 6:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. For the High Wind Warning, south winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Locally higher
entry.cap:areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe

entry.title: High Wind Warning issued February 16 at 7:34PM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. Isolated gusts up to 70 mph are possible across the highest peaks, mainly above 4000 feet. * WHERE...Johnson, Unicoi and Southeast Carter Counties.

entry.title: High Wind Warning issued February 16 at 7:34PM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 7:34PM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM EST /8 AM CST/ THURSDAY TO 1 AM EST /MIDNIGHT CST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Isolated gusts up to 55 mph are possible. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee, southwest Virginia and southwest North Carolina.

entry.title: Wind Advisory issued February 16 at 3:31PM CST until February 17 at 9:00PM CST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi, West Tennessee, East Arkansas and the Missouri Bootheel. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CST Thursday.

entry.summary: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40-50 mph expected. Higher gusts up to 55 mph possible in the highest elevations of northeastern Alabama and southern middle Tennessee. * WHERE...Portions of north central, northeast and northwest
